医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
机器学习有助于预测IBD患者的早期死亡率根据在CMAJ（加拿大医学协会期刊）发表的一项研究中，几乎一半死于炎症性肠病（IBD）过早死亡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/machine-learning-helps-predict-early-mortality-mortality-in-ibd-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/machine-learning-helps-predict-predict-early-mortality-in-ibd-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f98c2441-fb1e-430f-94f-94f-94fa-2d1c5a4fffe7 Mon, 24 Mar 2025 08:34:54 -0400 Machine learning helps predict early mortality in IBD patients
联合疗法可以预防数千例心血管死亡最大的分析是检查降低动脉阻塞的患者“不良”胆固醇水平的最佳方法表明，应立即将他们汀类药物和另一种称为Ezetimibe的药物组合，而不是单独给他汀类药物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/Combination-therapy-could-prevent-thousands-of-cardiovascular-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/combination-combination-therapy-could-prevent-prevent-th-cardiascular deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5E0A207D-0940-4AE2-A181-A181-A49A9CDC3C9E Mon, 24 Mar 2025 07:18:36 -0400 Combination therapy could prevent thousands of cardiovascular deaths
纳米技术创新旨在改善乳腺癌治疗昆士兰州大学的研究人员正在设计他们认为可以改善我们对待最激进的乳腺癌形式的纳米技术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/nanotechnology-innovation-innovation-to-to-improve-breast-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/nanotechnology-innovation-innovation-to-yaims-to-improve-breast-breast-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e4c527c0-1E01-47FE-B25D-6FAC0CD7C037 Mon, 24 Mar 2025 07:10:59 -0400 Nanotechnology innovation aims to improve breast cancer treatment
在前列腺癌诊断中，微拆卸与MRI一样有效一项国际临床试验表明，受高分辨率超声引导的活检与使用MRI诊断前列腺癌的活检有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/micro-ultrasound-proves-proves-as-efferce-mri-s-mri-in-prostate-cancer-cancer-dianning.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/micro-ultrasound-proves-proves-as-efferce--s-mri-in-prostate-prostate-cancer-dianning.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d11bc47e-9E4E-4050-A219-4389E7DE868A Mon, 24 Mar 2025 07:03:32 -0400 Micro-ultrasound proves as effective as MRI in prostate cancer diagnosis
Covid-19之后的孩子们兴起的散光症COVID-19的大流行导致儿童的散光增加，屏幕时间延长，室外活动较少，导致眼睛健康问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/astigmatism-on-the-the-the-rise-in-kids-kids-after-covid-19.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/astigmatism-on-the-the-rise-in-kids-kids-after-covid-19.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A26CC769-9EF8-42CB-B133-DD3A740BF6CA Mon, 24 Mar 2025 06:35:00 -0400 Astigmatism on the rise in kids after COVID-19
科罗拉多迷幻蘑菇实验已经到来科罗拉多州监管机构正在颁发许可证，以提供迷幻蘑菇，并计划授权该州的第一个“治愈中心”，在春末或初夏，可以在监督下摄入蘑菇。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/the-colorado-psychedelic-mushroom-experiment-has-arrived.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/the-colorado-psychedelic-mushroom-experiment-has-arrived.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5295A4A9-3838-4A02-B206-8F1F15AD8630 Mon, 24 Mar 2025 06:34:00 -0400 The Colorado psychedelic mushroom experiment has arrived
当前的前CDC工作人员警告不要削减对当地公共卫生部门的支持在亚特兰大举行的晴天，一小群人聚集在工会总部大楼外的集会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/current-former-former-cdc-staff-warn-against-splashing-super-support-support-to-local-public-public-public-health-departments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/current-former-former-crest-cdc-staff-warn-against-splashing-super-support-support-to-local-public-public-health-departments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8663E16B-9712-4D9A-8B6F-3B3B3C803C1F9F Mon, 24 Mar 2025 06:31:00 -0400 Current, former CDC staff warn against slashing support to local public health departments
柑橘疗法挤出癌症患者的口干橙，柠檬和酸橙的天然柑橘油在缓解口干方面非常有效，并且在与新的脂质配方结合使用时，新的研究表明，它可能没有显着副作用而有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/citrus-remedy-squeezes-und-dry-dry-mouth-for-cancer-patients.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/citrus-remedy-squeezes-un-dry-dry-mouth-for-cancer-patients.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38638D41-2DAF-4633-B606-B5533460DC19 Mon, 24 Mar 2025 05:16:00 -0400 Citrus remedy squeezes out dry mouth for cancer patients
“社会处方”可以帮助年轻人通过心理健康挑战 - 新研究曼彻斯特大学研究人员发现，使用“社会处方”可以改善儿童和年轻人的健康，可以加强政府对心理健康支持的政策。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/e28098social-prescription28099-can-help-young-young-young-through-through-through-through-through-through-health-health-challenges-challenges-e28093-new-new-research..aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250324/e28098social-prescription28099-can-help-young-young-young-through-through-through-through-through-through-challenge-challenges-challenges-e28093-new-new-research.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bc21b4fc-a228-4143-9459-15a23484d22e Mon, 24 Mar 2025 05:13:00 -0400 ‘Social prescriptions’ can help young people through mental health challenges – New research
疾病预防控制中心确认黑腿壁虱会导致人类的红肉过敏研究人员证实，黑腿s虫（ixodes capularis）可以触发人类的α-伽尔综合症。在缅因州进行的为期10年的监视确定了23例在孤星壁虱已知范围之外的肉过敏的案件。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250323/cdc-confirms-black-legged-ticks-can-can-can-caus-cause-red-meat-meat-meat-allergy-in-humans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250323/cdc-confirms-black--legge--------------------can-can-cause-red-meat-meat-meat-allergy-in-humans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=01AB0E6-2B25-45ED-993D-028E94D122EB Sun, 23 Mar 2025 22:50:00 -0400 CDC confirms black-legged ticks can cause red meat allergy in humans
